text: On requirements for Supply Chain Logistics. I made some edits and improvements over the draft talked through from WG Monday, November 21st call.  Reviews, comments, input welcome <https://wiki.hyperledger.org/requirements/use-cases/use-case-supply-chain-logistics>

I need to handoff the following items at least for the short-term, so any assists or volunteers would be much appreciated:
		○ Ledger Platform Comparison (Draft) as of 2016-11-16
			§ <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ajtRVRvBO7k1YZsmYdLDs8jQN_V1MacISY6Jek4J7ig/edit?usp=sharing>
			§ Sawtooth team feedback integration
		○ Requirements Strawman as of 2016-12-04
			§ <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1I8Q9uOflROviCFw0Fyxya-7kqVTlCdkErjIVmhIsW3A/edit?usp=sharing>
			§ Sanity check and next steps
		○ Use case inventory
			§ <https://wiki.hyperledger.org/groups/requirements/use-case-inventory>
			§ Maintenance
Tie outs to existing sources like fabric, sawtooth, corda, world ec forum, etc.
